page.title: 09ELPHINSTONE GALA COMMITTEE
page.content: THE CHAIRPERSON IS ELEANOR BROWN AND THE TREASURERS ARE ENGRID ELLIS AND MARGRET BUCHAN.THERE ARE ABOUT 13 MEMBERS ON THE COMMITTEE.THERE WAS NOT GOING BE A GALA IN 1985, BUT ELEANOR AND ENGRID CALLED A MEETING AND MADE ANOTHER GALA COMMITTEE.THEY HAVE A RAFFLE,GUESS THE DOLL'S BIRTHDAY COMPETITION AND A COFFEE MORNING.THEY RAISED ABOUT Â£233.THEY GOT Â£50 FROM PENICUIK ALUMINIUM.THEY WROTE TO TEMPLETONS IN PAISLEY FOR A DONATION AND WILL BE GETTING A CHEQUE SOON.THEY ARE HAVING A HORSEY NIGHT.IT IS A BIG SCREEN AND A PROJECTOR SHOWS A HORSE RACE AND PEOPLE BET WHICH HORSE WILL WIN.THEY ARE GOING TO HAVE A LADIES'NIGHT AS WELL.THEY ARE HAVING A BAND AND A CABARET.THEY ALL HOPE TO RAISE OVER Â£300 WITH THE TWO EVENTS.THEY HAVE RAISED ABOUT Â£290 ALREADY.
